title: WALL STREET VIBES--FREE AMENITIES--FIDI CLASSIC--
posting_body: ['WALL STREET VIBES--FREE AMENITIES--FIDI CLASSIC--', 'Listing ID #: 212886', 'Price: $3,419', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 2.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Building Amenities', 'Bicycle Room', 'Diplomats OK', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Health Club', 'Laundry', 'Lounge', 'Subway', 'Valet', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Dishwasher', 'Granite Kitchen', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'Marble Bath', 'Open View', 'Renovated', 'Walk In Closet', 'Nicely sized flex two bedrooms apartment with modern finishes in luxury building located in the heart of the Financial District.', 'Features beautiful Oak hardwood floors and excellent closet space.', 'Also includes fully-equipped kitchen with generous cabinet space, natural stone counter tops, and stainless steel appliances including microwave and dishwasher.', 'The lavish, full Carrera marble bath is appointed with sleek contemporary details.', 'The building provides a unique landscape for modern, luxury living with apartments of various sizes ranging from spacious studios to elegant two bedroom units.', 'Conveniently located just steps from all major subway lines, this full-service building includes 24-hour doorman and concierge, elevator, laundry, state-of-the-art fitness center, rooftop deck, exclusive lounge featuring screening room and billiard room and pets are welcome.', 'Storage and bicycle storage is available', 'CONTACT MARCO TO SCHEDULE A PRIVATE VIEWING MOBILE 917-353-3448 EMAIL', '<URL> TEXT FOR FASTER RESPONSE', 'Marco Bianchi', 'Phone: 9173533448', 'Mobile: 9173533448', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Marco Bianchi at 9173533448']
